snippet: Italy’s Luna Rossa is threatening to sit out Sunday’s opening race of the America’s Cup while it awaits the ruling of an international jury on a protest.
abstract: Italy's Luna Rossa team is threatening to sit out opening race of America's Cup while it awaits ruling of international jury on protest; team, along with Emirates Team New Zealand, is protesting rules change following death of British sailor Andrew Simpson in May.
lead_paragraph: Italy’s Luna Rossa is threatening to sit out Sunday’s opening race of the America’s Cup while it awaits the ruling of an international jury on a protest.

headline.main: Luna Rossa Threatens to Skip America’s Cup Opener
headline.print_headline: Luna Rossa May Skip Cup Opener
